Title: Billions
Writer: Brian Koppelman, David Levien, Andrew Ross Sorkin
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff
Plot: New money means no mercy as Mike Prince takes the Axe Capital throne. Chuck Rhoades is convinced no one should have that much wealth - or power. As all the players seek out new alliances, only one thing's for certain - wealth mean...
